channel.title: CVE Feed for mastersoft -- ZOOKViewer_Setup.exe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mastersoft -- ZOOKViewer_Setup.exe

item.title: CVE-2020-7877|2024-08-04T09:41:02.007Z -- mastersoft -- zookviewer_setup.exe
item.description: A buffer overflow issue was discovered in ZOOK solution(remote administration tool) through processing 'ConnectMe' command while parsing a crafted OUTERIP value because of missing boundary check. This vulnerability allows the attacker to execute remote arbitrary command.
